privacy-text: Control your privacy for every team you have joined.
team-update-text: You can only update the teams you are leading.

maps.name-will-appear: Your name will appear on the maps
maps.username-will-appear: Your username will appear on the maps
maps.will-not-appear: Your name and username will not appear on the maps

leaderboards.name-will-appear: Your name will appear on the leaderboards
leaderboards.username-will-appear: Your username will appear on the leaderboards
leaderboards.will-not-appear: Your name and username will not appear on the leaderboards
